website_summaries.verdict: If you want a low-flow showerhead that actually delivers some good pressure, this is a great model.
pros: Innovative design injects air in shower head so this low-flow shower stream feels like a full shower
cons: Still a low-flow showerhead, meaning it takes a lot of time to get shampoo out of your hair

customer_reviews.title: Got it right second time
customer_reviews.text: Buy this one it's AMAZING! After spending a fortune to remodel my bathroom I went cheap for a shower head the first time...Don't do it! Some people say it is not forceful enough to rinse your hair good enough. My wife begs to differ. She loves the gentle rain flow and it rinses fine. It is not cheap but you know the old saying!
customer_reviews.author: mtypockets

customer_reviews.title: Now we have it and are more than pleased. It goes back to a basic rule - ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the shower head we wanted in the first place. Now we have it and are more than pleased. It goes back to a basic rule - if you buy the best in the first place you only cry once.
customer_reviews.author: Readaholic

customer_reviews.title: This was the shower head we chose and we couldn't possibly be happier. I wish I could say the same for ...
customer_reviews.text: We just recently built a new house and the master bath is the showcase of the construction - a 5' x 7' steam shower with electronic controls and body sprayers. The whole 9 yards. This was the shower head we chose and we couldn't possibly be happier. I wish I could say the same for most of the other stuff we bought. This thing is fantastic. It is big enough that you are completely drenched in water from the second you step in. If you are looking for a rainfall shower then this is the one to get. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Don't Panic

customer_reviews.title: Great shower head but needs a new stem nut.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just like real rain. My only complaint is that there isn't enough clearance to fit a spanner wrench on the stem nut. The actual stem is really close to the rotating ball so if you try to use a spanner wrench it will strip the stem nut. A 17mm wrench must be used. Personally, I feel that a shower head at this price point would have everything near perfect and I didn't find that to be the case. Especially since a $19.99 shower head from WallyWorld has plenty of space for tightening the stem nut.
customer_reviews.author: Duck Farm

customer_reviews.title: Not a spa-like feeling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a rain shower head hoping for like that drenching rain spa-like shower experience. That is not the case. It's maybe 50% amount of water that I would expect. In terms of washing off soap and shampoo lather, it's does wash off the lather, but you need to help it with your hands. The water itself doesn't do it alone. Most of the time, I just use the body/handheld spray to wash my off soap/shampoo lather. As a reference, my water pressure is 70 psi.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line Rain Shower, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: As we were finishing up our bathroom, our designer showed us this Hansgrohe rainshower - with an outrageous price. I quickly looked it up on my phone on Amazon and found this - a great deal without the designer mark-up. No difference, just great value.
customer_reviews.author: DGC80

customer_reviews.title: Quality, 10" of rain splendor
customer_reviews.text: Love these showerheads, put 2 in my home. Quality product with the rain feel. The air between the drops is noticeable and creates a spa, light rain feel. You may think it isn't removing the shampoo/conditioner out of your hair BUT it definitely does. Chrome adds that little sparkle the room needed. Lots of compliments. 10" is perfect size to cover you with water, no cold spots.
customer_reviews.author: marlinwife

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but wonderful. It's something that gets used multiple times every day, so the price feels worth it. I do wonder if some of the alternatives for far less would give a similar result, but trusted the reviews on this piece. Combined it with a filter and have had great results. Even our 6 yr old thinks it's better than our previous standard shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Evanescent03

customer_reviews.title: No adjustment on water restriction
customer_reviews.text: The restrictor cannot be removed or adjusted. Barely has any flow compared to what is going into the shower head. Disappointed in purchase, wouldn’t recommend for someone looking for a stronger stream of water.
customer_reviews.author: April Lee

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth every dime!  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I order it yesterday & received today! I love it! I installed it myself & it was so easy! My last rain shower head that I head cost a Fortune over $1,000.00 and leaked & was corroded all the time! I am very pleased with this purchase! I can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Tana Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and great body coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about this, but I couldn't be happier. The size is perfect and the spray diffuses just enough to really give you good coverage. Quality is outstanding. The rubber nozzles make is easy to clean which is really important bc we have hard water where I love. Most other people I know here can't use their rainfall heads because they are clogged up with the calcium build up. Build quality is great. Solid and heavy. Looks great matched up with my Restoration Hardware faucets and hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Enginepy

customer_reviews.title: Best shower head ever
customer_reviews.text: Used one in London England at a friend's home last year and just had to buy one for our winter home. And it is as excellent as I remembered it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Garth Chapman

customer_reviews.title: One of the most refreshing shower heads I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is awesome. The raindrops are soft and luxurious. This feels like a spa shower. Installation was fairly easy. The shower head is kind of heavy, so it's a bit awkward to get the threads lined up so they screw into the outlet pipe properly. But once it was installed, the shower I took was well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Changed our showering experience
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when buying this shower head. It has been worth every penny. My wife didn't even care about having this, but she now exclusively uses this shower head. We have dual shower heads in our master shower. We have a rain head coming straight from the ceiling and a normal head on the wall. We like this one so much we plan on buying a Hansgrohe shower head for our wall unit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Head
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this showerhead. We have it mounted to a 17" arm, and it works great. It certainly wasn't the cheapest showerhead, but if it lasts many years, we will be happy. One thing however, this showerhead is rather heavy for its size. Make sure your shower arm is strong, or have your pipe come down from the ceiling. We are using the longest shower arm we could find, but the head is still not centered over the drain.
customer_reviews.author: A N 3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: 10" is a great size. Sure, perhaps you can do 12", but 10" seems good enough for me. I love its output. Remember, this comes with a pipe (about 6") and this about how far down it hangs down from the ceiling. The rainhead also has a pivot mount so that you can angle the head (you are not limited to a purely horizontal positioning of the head...I have mine slightly angled to spray a bit more angled instead of straight down).
customer_reviews.author: Elysium

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a true rain shower experience, don't bother looking at anything else......It's AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: David L.Durnbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great rain forest shower head.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head. It’s just like rain. If does reduce the way you usually feel in a shower. It rinses you off really well and it great heavy duty metal.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, no leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap, but worth it. Very satisfied. Needed new pipe to stand further out from the wall. (like Sarlai Brushed Nickel S Shape 17 Inch Extension Shower Arm with Stainless Steel Flange)
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice showerhead
customer_reviews.text: Have used several rain heads in the past but this one is the best so far in my opinion, the cheaper ones do not compare.
customer_reviews.author: J Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Cool showerhead. Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Cool showerhead. Worked as advertised. Def need to remove the limited. Also i prefer a much more powerful flow so if that’s what you are looking for this is not the showerhead for you. It’s a very soft flow. Feels nice just not a lot of force.
customer_reviews.author: David Greelish

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Reviews are correct
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Reviews are correct! Nice strong stream, that goes straight down and doesn't splash outwards. This is the first water saving shower head I have experienced that gets the shampoo and conditioner out of my long hair efficiently and quickly! 5 years later-I still love my shower head. No issues! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: the title says 10" when I got it it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: the title says 10" when I got it it's not 10" but rather 9 1/4". Haven't decided whether I want to try it out or just return it for a larger size rain shower head.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lee

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: This is an OMG purchase! The size, amount of holes, and aeration combine into simply the best shower possible. Makes my skin feel fantastic for hours. I am glad we rerouted the plumbing to come from the ceiling to accomodate this wonderful showerhead.
customer_reviews.author: L. Parry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great showerhead. Well worth the price paid. The airjets really make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product... expensive ... but well worth it... look and performance are second to none... while it is a single function it is all you need ...
customer_reviews.author: choirboyz

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than the cheaper rainfall shower heads.
customer_reviews.text: This shower head feels like soft rain. I used a cheaper shower head on a previous shower project and there is no comparison. The difference between this shower head and the cheaper ones is amazing. Definitely worth the difference in cost.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stratton

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this. The price is a little extreme for a shower head but I can't see it being any better at what it does. We have to heads so there is a standard one for washing hair. But it seems to come down strong enough we could get by with just the rain head.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hopper

customer_reviews.title: but broad enough to feel great. I just love it
customer_reviews.text: Finally got our new bath finished, and despite using Grohe fixtures, installed this Hansgrohe Rainshower Head. Not too big, but broad enough to feel great. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Quality unit, low water usage
customer_reviews.text: Great rainshower head. Uses low amounts of water. Nice steady downpour for the amount of water used. Quality product, bought two of them, really enjoy both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth a great deal more than I paid. It is raining in my shower. No others can compare.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great preassure
customer_reviews.text: Just completed a remodeled shower and added this as shower head. Love the fact that when I get under it it covers my whole body instead of a small area. Amazed at how much water preassure this shower head has!!! The design is very sleek and classy!! So glad i found this online. I originally found it in a store but saved $200.00 by ordering it from this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower head
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower head. Feels like what a rain shower should be. Powerful enough to get all soaps and shampoos off but still gentle enough to feel like a rain shower.
customer_reviews.author: Minglez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best head I have experienced. I have good rinsing with shampooing although my hair is not long.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Light spray
customer_reviews.text: Not real happy with water flow. The one it replaced dumped water . This one is like a sprinkler I used to run through as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: tom myrs

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 9' height shower. The spread is remarkable. Amazing how it feels considering how little water is uses
customer_reviews.author: B. Tiplitz

customer_reviews.title: Works without clogging
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rain showerhead on the market. It also (seemingly) never needs cleaning...I purchased this showerhead months ago and live in an area with a high amount of particulates and yet the product keeps on going strong!
customer_reviews.author: S. Zaidins

customer_reviews.title: Just like a Downpour!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this showerhead, because my girl has always wanted a massive downpour showerhead in the bathroom. Ever place we have ever rented from or owned she would want a showerhead like this in it. Finally when we bought a house I purchased this showerhead as a gift for her. Needless to say she absolutely loves the showerhead. We have been using this showerhead for about a year now and we have yet to have any issues with it. The build is extremely durable and the installation couldn't have been easier. Hansgrohe has knocked this out of the park. If you are looking for a good, and relatively affordable, downpour showerhead - look no further! Buy this one now!
customer_reviews.author: King of the Stream

customer_reviews.title: beautiful to look at - wonderful to use
customer_reviews.text: Part of tub to shower conversion. Very happy with Hans-Grohe selection. Beautiful looks, Very smooth, quality feel. Incredible shower experience. Glad I went with 10" instead of 12" for the coverage to price!
customer_reviews.author: George Boats Bikes Planes Home Automation LEDs

customer_reviews.title: Hansgrohe Delivers
customer_reviews.text: Quality Looks very nice It does the job !!️ Bj
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rain shower
customer_reviews.text: These German products are so well made and so good looking. That is exactly what this rainshower is...a great product hands down over everything else. Quality, craftsmanship and great looking product. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: waynjer64

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Incredible! Wife is happy too. I was already a fan of Hansgrohe - best damn faucet available in the world (and I came from the faucet industry working for one of the big boys - junk) and this puppy did not disappoint me. I installed this with a 20" arm so that it drops straight down on us - I beefed up my drop ear elbow behind the wall just to be safe (remodel job). Great performance! You can feel the air/water interaction.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Man

customer_reviews.title: but it is amazing for a low flow showerhead
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but it is amazing for a low flow showerhead.
customer_reviews.author: GB in NY

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SHOWER EVER !!
customer_reviews.text: After searching for a rain shower I found this Hansgrohe Raindance Air Shower. The price was great thru Amazon and the German technology of mixing air and water together to create the rain shower makes it very difficult to ever turn it off. If your water source is a well, like I have, you might have to increase the water pressure at the well pump to get the desired rain shower affect.
customer_reviews.author: Don L. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Product works but I am worried that it shipped without ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works but I am worried that it shipped without the safety screw. What if it falls off and injures someone?
customer_reviews.author: VL

customer_reviews.title: Love this showerhead!
customer_reviews.text: We have a well and a pump so our water pressure is low to moderate. This is the first showerhead that has worked as promised. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Rowley

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part about the bathroom I just spent over a ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is glorious. My favorite part about the bathroom I just spent over a year remodeling :(
customer_reviews.author: beffalonious

customer_reviews.title: Great rainhead!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the price. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with the 15" shower
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding in every aspect. Easy to install with the 15" shower arm
customer_reviews.author: Bob B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rainshower
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product. It really compliments our shower. Its quality is what makes it so nice. You will not be disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece
customer_reviews.text: Not looking forward to the water bills now. Very nice flow, feel, and spray. Everything is uniform and a nice gentle rain flowing through the jets. Would certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD M.

customer_reviews.title: Showerhead
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Easy to install and put out a rain like spray. Just what I had been looking for. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Swampy

customer_reviews.title: expensive but
customer_reviews.text: This is the best part of our bathroom upgrade. My wife though I was nuts ordering this but now agrees this makes the showering wonderful
customer_reviews.author: George N

customer_reviews.title: Superior
customer_reviews.text: My second Hansgrohe purchase and not my last - - they are just well made and look expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with it. I think I don't have to upgrade the shower head for many years.
customer_reviews.author: hanglingna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: bought this because of all the positive reviews. I was not disappointed. coverage is good and water pressure is good. I have not tried other rain showers so I have nothing to compare it to. the only bad thing is that now my daughter (2.5 yrs old) and I are spoiled. she calls it "the nice shower"
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: amazing but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best showerhead I've ever had. It's wide enough to cover me shoulder to shoulder when I stand under it. I have hair that water runs off of and this showerhead actually wets and rinses my hair faster than any showerhead I've had. The only problem I have with it is the weight of the showerhead and having to get a few extra parts to reinforce the arm behind the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's expensive but you are getting better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Made to last and one of few shower heads still made of metal. It's expensive but you are getting better quality.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. You will not want to get out of your shower. We never remodeled a shower before and did not know about all the new government regulations regarding gallons per minute. This really produces a strong, but amazing water flow. Just like Maui in the rain forest. This is the one. It is not worth getting a cheap imitation. This company has been in business for over 100 years. This is the Mercedes of shower heads.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Noveck

customer_reviews.title: Soft Rain
customer_reviews.text: My husband totally loves this. Feels like soft pleasant rain. Used with a 6-8" extension on a 96" ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: 72cocoa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered to Australia ahead of time and all items included. Performs well
customer_reviews.author: Danny O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, quality built, SOLID Unit.
customer_reviews.text: I am a contractor remodeling my own home and I've seen a lot of Junk installed in bathrooms. This shower head is built well. In use it sounds like its raining and feels like standing in a heavy rain. This isn't a powerful spray, it's more like a drenching rain. I highly recommend it. If you're building new, add to your shower a spray wand to assist the lady's in cleaning their hair with something a little more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cornine

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but...
customer_reviews.text: Items looks great. Heavy, right size, finish is solid. Does not look cheap at all. My beef was with pressure. It seemed to just gently spray or rain on you. Not a downpour. We have decent water pressure at the house. So it's going back. Maybe just right for others. But I need more pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Feels like soooo much water!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Really feels like a LOT more water than it actually is. You can even test how it feels without the special feature by reaching up and blocking the center hole, WOW what a difference their technology makes!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: An amazing experience. Air injection definitely is the way to ...
customer_reviews.text: An amazing experience. Air injection definitely is the way to go. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERT ALBERTINI

customer_reviews.title: It is great! Nice quality built product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shower head for master bath remodel. It is great! Nice quality built product.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shower head!
customer_reviews.text: I totally agree with mtbgirl, I installed mine last night and it truly is an awesome shower head. With the Air-jet technology you can FEEL EVERY water drop hitting your body, kind of like standing in the rain! To see, feel and HEAR the difference between with and without the air induced jet all you have to do is put your finger in the center where the air intake is to temporary block the flow of air and you can't believe the difference! Overall I am very happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Transforms a shower experience
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of showerheads, including some solid performers from Speakman, but this showerhead is terrific. Great coverage, almost like having multiple showerheads. You cannot adjust the spray; thus, you have to like a gentle output.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: We viewed this showerhead at a local bath design center and they wanted twice the price, thank God for Amazon. I love the showerhead, it was the perfect addition to our shower remodel. Having the shower come from the ceiling is so genius and the amount of water from this showerhead that hits you is FABULOUS! Everything about it is perfect. It is also large and has a WOW factor to it when people see it! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Darr

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight of Rainfall Shower Heads!
customer_reviews.text: High quality shower head! The air intermixed with the water gives it a true rainfall feel! I mounted mine to a 10" upward extension that has no additional support; I was initially concerned that the weight might be too much for the in-wall mounted shower pipe, but it is proving to not be an issue. Spend the extra money on this one, and you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's works great. I am very satisfied with the purchase. The install was easy and the price was right. You will need to get a chrome pipe from your local plumbing supplier for tie in.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much better than expensive English Kingsley Bate -- it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Lyman Perry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Really feels like a rain shower...much better than the one I replaced!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sayre

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly downpour
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this shower head. I paired it with a Danze curved arm - turned the angled pipe coming out of the wall to point up, attached the Danze arm, and then the shower head at the end of the arm. The arm is long enough that you can easily get under the rain shower, and the entire assembly looks nice, despite being cobbled together. The shower feels like a downpour even on a fairly low volume setting due to all the air mixed in. I am really happy with it, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: No need to go the amazon rain forest!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing, easy install, and works great. A thousand times better than the rain fall shower head that came with my new house. Everyone I know is jelous. I wish there was a valve to choose from amazon rainfall to a drizzle rain effect. However, I knew there was not when I bought the product. I did buy this product on sale I feel the full retail price is a little steep.
customer_reviews.author: Marc LaTorre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install strong enough waterflow to wash shampoo out of hair, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Dpesto

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Total immersive rain drenching experience. Got this for a recent bathroom remodel. Love it. I haven't been this excited about taking showers ever. Just bear in mind that this is a 2.5 GPM flow rate and if you remodel and take a permit you need to make sure the flow rate meets permit requirements.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Nice but expensive; expensive but nice.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but worth it if you like rainshower heads. Great customer service. I lost a set screw for installation and they immediately sent me several replacements because they know they're small and easy to lose. Flow is excellent, there are tons of nozzles made of an easy-to-de-calcify silicone material.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C.

customer_reviews.title: Waaaay better than the 5 other Mickey Mouse shower heads I've ...
customer_reviews.text: You can stop searching now. Buy this one. Expensive, but worth it. Waaaay better than the 5 other Mickey Mouse shower heads I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: best shower but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: best overhead shower money can buy; though expensive but the wife loves it; she never liked overhead showers but she was blown away by this and now she is spending too much time in there enjoying the rain-shower; So am I. It is hard to get out once you get in as it has this great calming effect. Shower is a breeze now. Wow
customer_reviews.author: nanabi

customer_reviews.title: I love this showerhead
customer_reviews.text: For a real rainbath experience, try this one, it's great. Strong spray, but gentle at the same time. I wish I had this years ago. It's quite large and gives good coverage. An excellent choice!
customer_reviews.author: Scrapper Mom

customer_reviews.title: It is a huge and expensive disappointment. If I had not thrown out the box ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a huge and expensive disappointment. If I had not thrown out the box I would be sending it back. It is very soft, almost drippy. It was an expensive mistake. My old $25 shower head works better and is now back in place. How can you sell this???
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K. Egan

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Installs pretty easy, lots of flow, and feels great. It looks sharp as well. I recommend it. Word to your mother.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING shower head
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING shower head. Highly recommend this over other "name brand" heads. This one for the money has more "holes" or "jets" for water and is overall larger. My husband and I also purchased a name brand to compare, this one blew the other one away.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wish we had installed 1 on each wall of our shower :) Pressure is perfect. Not a Fire hose but wasnt designed to be. Want a fire hose feel, install a fire hose Shower head..
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Bobby

customer_reviews.title: I would like to say however
customer_reviews.text: I was very optimistic about this shower head based on the other reviews. I also figured it would be a quality product because it was a lot more expensive than most and there were no plastic parts. Wrong . . . the flange leaked when screwing in the security ring. It's badly designed, period. I would like to say however, that the return was easy peasy. Thank you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Dagny

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, was concerned about too much or too ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had it installed now for a few months, excellent product, was concerned about too much or too little spray from this shower head. Spray is excellent for hair rinsing etc...
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: rain shower
customer_reviews.text: it is gorgeous looking. Has plenty of water pressure. I was convinced it had to be a ten inch head. The downside to having one this large is you have to step out from the shower head to avert water in you eyes. It isn't like you can just tilt your head. I am okay with that aspect, but it is something to think about
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: We love this shower head
customer_reviews.text: We love this shower head! Excellent value for the money and its stainless steel ...not plastic as many are today. It has an excellent downfall and is strong enough to rinse long shampooed hair. Spend the money...you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Even with good water pressure you can barely feel this rain shower
customer_reviews.text: Even with good water pressure you can barely feel this rain shower. (The opposite of what I was hoping for.)
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: No plastic pieces in this product! Just make sure you clean it or else the hard water builds up on it and you don't get a nice shower.
customer_reviews.author: ADub

customer_reviews.title: Showering is heaven!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower head we have ever had!!! The spray is so soft on your skin,yet comes out with good volume. It has a wipe clean feature which allows you to simple brush off any mineral build-up in the nozzles with a soft cloth.No abrasives or scrubbing needed. Expensive,but worth every cent-highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anita S

customer_reviews.title: Love it but VERY expensive for what it is!
customer_reviews.text: Love it but way too expensive for what it is... as my bath store salesman said, one can find a very high-quality brushed nickel shower head for a lot LESS money.
customer_reviews.author: BeaniesMom

customer_reviews.title: clean, relaxed, and refreshed
customer_reviews.text: Every time i take a shower, I never want to get out--- I feel clean, relaxed, and refreshed. Beautiful showerhead!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not installed yet, but together with the Hansgrohe showerarm ...
customer_reviews.text: Not installed yet, but together with the Hansgrohe showerarm this is an understated center piece of our new bathroom. This shower head was made the same way Mercedes Benz cars were made before 1995: pure quality and no compromise.
customer_reviews.author: terra promissa

customer_reviews.title: Love taking showers now!
customer_reviews.text: Feels amazing! I havnt tried any other rain shower heads, but from all the reviews ive read everywhere, THIS is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Fireice

customer_reviews.title: Rain down on me
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was expecting from Hansgrohe. A quality product at a fair price. I love shopping Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product at a great price from an awesome seller.
customer_reviews.author: Team Q

customer_reviews.title: It pours water on my head
customer_reviews.text: I sometimes just stand in the middle of my shower and stare up till my face feels numb from the drops falling. Or i sit and let it fall on my shoulders/neck/back like a homeless guy waiting for the rain to end.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The most wonderful shower experience
customer_reviews.text: Pair this with the Hansgrohe 04266000 Unica S Wallbar, and it will be the best shower experience ever!
customer_reviews.author: JoeM

product_meta.title: hansgrohe Raindance S 9-inch Showerhead Easy Install Modern 1-Spray RainAir Air Infusion with Airpower with QuickClean in Chrome, 27474001
product_meta.description:
Color:ChromeThe large 9.375-inch showerhead offer you a very special shower experience. The wide spray makes you feel as if you are in the rainforest. The water droplets are enriched with air on the Hansgrohe Raindance S 240 AIR 1-Jet Showerhead, meaning they are even softer and plumper. AirPower technology sees to that. The flow rate on the overhead shower measures 2.5 GPM. With the Hansgrohe Raindance S 240 AIR 1-Jet Showerhead with fully chrome-plated spray disc, optimal operation is guaranteed. The QuickClean function is there to help when cleaning. Dirt is removed easily from the flexible silicon nozzles by simply rubbing it away – resulting in a perfect shower spray at all times. Bring a special shower experience into your bathroom with the Hansgrohe Raindance S 240 AIR 1-Jet Showerhead. If you have any questions or concerns regarding this product and/or it's functionality, please contact Hansgrohe‘s Customer Service department.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Hansgrohe Raindance S 240 AIR Showerhead in Chrome 27474001. At Hansgrohe, we draw on knowledge gained from over 100 years of industry experience. One of our major innovations is AirPower technology: water jets mixed with air turn into a gentle rain shower or a powerful massage jet. The QuickClean feature makes it easy to rub limescale deposit off the flexible silicone jets . Raindance S AIR features modern styling. Each drop of water is infused with air, for an invigorating high-performance shower. Founded in Germany's Black Forest in 1901, Hansgrohe is committed to building a strong sense of tradition. Hansgrohe's products offer a lifetime of satisfaction featuring the ultimate in quality, design and performance. Customers appreciate our many breakthroughs in comfort and technology that allow you to make the most of water. With its wide range of products, Hansgrohe has the right solution for you. Enjoy every moment, each one is unique, just like your Hansgrohe shower.Shower arm is NOT included.
feature_bullets: With the large showerhead (9.375 inches) and RainAir spray mode, you can enjoy an especially intense shower experience
Enjoy the exceptional design of the overhead shower and the long lifetime of the fully chrome-plated spray disc
Cleaning is child's play thanks to the QuickClean anti-calcification function Limescale deposits are simply rubbed from the flexible silicon nozzles
AirPower technology enriches the water with air, resulting in soft, pleasant water droplets on your skin

specifications.Warranty Description: Hansgrohe, Inc. warrants to the original consumer purchaser that hansgrohe products will be free from defects in material and workmanship for as long as the original consumer purchaser owns both the product and the home in which the product was originally installed.
